codeSystems.name: CarePlanActivityKind
codeSystems.title: Care Plan Activity Kind
codeSystems.description: Resource types defined as part of FHIR that can be represented as in-line definitions of a care plan activity.

codeSystems.name: CarePlanActivityOutcome
codeSystems.title: Care Plan Activity Outcome
codeSystems.description: Example codes indicating the outcome of a care plan activity. Note that these are in no way complete and might not even be appropriate for some uses.

codeSystems.name: CarePlanActivityStatus
codeSystems.title: CarePlanActivityStatus
codeSystems.description: Codes that reflect the current state of a care plan activity within its overall life cycle.

codeSystems.name: CarePlanCategory
codeSystems.title: Care Plan Category
codeSystems.description: Example codes indicating the category a care plan falls within.  Note that these are in no way complete and might not even be appropriate for some uses.

codeSystems.name: CarePlanIntent
codeSystems.title: Care Plan Intent
codeSystems.description: Codes indicating the degree of authority/intentionality associated with a care plan.

codeSystems.name: CareTeamCategory
codeSystems.title: Care Team category
codeSystems.description: Indicates the type of care team.

codeSystems.name: CareTeamStatus
codeSystems.title: CareTeamStatus
codeSystems.description: Indicates the status of the care team.

codeSystems.name: SNOMEDCTClinicalFindings
codeSystems.title: SNOMED CT Clinical Findings
codeSystems.description: This value set includes all the "Clinical finding" [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) codes - concepts where concept is-a 404684003 (Clinical finding (finding)).

codeSystems.name: CommunicationCategory
codeSystems.title: CommunicationCategory
codeSystems.description: Codes for general categories of communications such as alerts, instructions, etc.

codeSystems.name: CommunicationNotDoneReason
codeSystems.title: CommunicationNotDoneReason
codeSystems.description: Codes for the reason why a communication did not happen.

codeSystems.name: EventStatus
codeSystems.title: EventStatus
codeSystems.description: Codes identifying the lifecycle stage of an event.

codeSystems.name: CommonLanguages
codeSystems.title: Common Languages
codeSystems.description: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

codeSystems.name: SNOMEDCTMedicationCodes
codeSystems.title: SNOMED CT Medication Codes
codeSystems.description: This value set includes all drug or medicament substance codes and all pharmaceutical/biologic products from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar value set.

codeSystems.name: ParticipantRoles
codeSystems.title: Participant Roles
codeSystems.description: Roles of participants that may be included in a care team.  Defined as: Is a Person, Healthcare professional (occupation) or Healthcare related organization (qualifier value).

codeSystems.name: ProcedureCodes(SNOMEDCT)
codeSystems.title: Procedure Codes (SNOMED CT)
codeSystems.description: Procedure Code: All SNOMED CT procedure codes.

codeSystems.name: RequestPriority
codeSystems.title: Request priority
codeSystems.description: The clinical priority of a diagnostic order.

codeSystems.name: RequestStatus
codeSystems.title: RequestStatus
codeSystems.description: Codes identifying the lifecycle stage of a request.

codeSystems.name: ParticipationMode
codeSystems.title: ParticipationMode
codeSystems.description: Identifies the primary means by which an Entity participates in an Act.
